product_overview: Stroller Chic is an e-commerce platform dedicated to luxury baby strollers, offering users a refined shopping experience with product browsing, detailed views, a seamless checkout process, and an admin dashboard for store management.
core_goals: Provide an elegant and user-friendly platform for customers to browse and purchase luxury baby strollers.
Ensure smooth and secure user authentication through login and registration functionalities.
Enable customers to easily add products to their cart and complete purchases via a streamlined checkout process.
Offer detailed product information to help customers make informed buying decisions.
Equip store administrators with comprehensive tools to manage the product catalog and orders through an admin dashboard.
Support efficient local development and deployment workflows to maintain agility.
key_features: Home Page as a welcoming landing page for the e-commerce site.
Shop Page showcasing a comprehensive product catalog with listing capabilities.
Product Details Page providing in-depth information about individual products.
Shopping Cart Page allowing customers to view and modify their selected items.
Checkout Page facilitating a secure and user-friendly checkout experience.
User Authentication Pages including Login and Registration for account management.
Admin Dashboard enabling store management including product and order handling.
Modern tech stack utilizing TypeScript, React, Vite, TailwindCSS, Shadcn UI, React Router, Tanstack Query, Zod, Zustand, and Supabase for robust frontend and backend integration.
Local development support with Bun package manager and straightforward build and deployment processes.
user_flow_summary: Visitors land on the Home Page to get introduced to Stroller Chic and navigate to product listings.
Users browse the Shop Page to view available luxury baby strollers and select products for more detail.
On the Product Details Page, users examine features, images, and pricing of chosen strollers.
Customers add products to their Cart and review selections on the Cart Page with options to modify quantities or remove items.
Users proceed to Checkout, entering payment and shipping details to finalize their purchases securely.
New users can register for an account, while returning users log in to access personalized features and order history.
Admins access the Admin Dashboard for managing products and orders efficiently.
Throughout, users experience seamless navigation supported by React Router and data management with Tanstack Query and Zustand.
validation_criteria: All pages (Home, Shop, Product Details, Cart, Checkout, Login, Register, Admin Dashboard) load correctly and render as expected across supported browsers.
User authentication workflows (registration, login, logout) function securely and reliably with proper input validation and error handling.
Product listing and details accurately display information retrieved from the backend and update dynamically as needed.
Cart management correctly reflects user actions including adding, removing, and updating product quantities.
Checkout process completes successfully with proper order placement and confirmation feedback.
Admin Dashboard allows authorized users to perform management tasks without errors or security breaches.
Local development environment setup instructions allow developers to run, build, and deploy the app without issues.
UI components are responsive and accessible, adhering to modern design and usability standards.
